column3: I belong to a bookclub, so I visit often. But I have been borrowing books from here since a little kid. Always have the books I need and staff is awesome!

column2: Many services and activities for the community
column3: Being the main library in Burbank it provides services such as audiovisual, online access, meeting rooms as well as a large collection of books and research material.In an attractive building it has a fine open space that caters for all who wish to partake.
